      • playerClassesAndJars

        static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> playerClassesAndJars
        Player classes and optionally the url to the jar on the web that the class is located in. Player class is in index [0] of the array and the jar is in index [1]. Index [1] is null (but still there) if the default class loader should be used.
